item.name: Slack
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::J, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::V, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT

__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::J, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_OPTION | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::CURSOR_UP, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_OPTION | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT

__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::L, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_OPTION | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::CURSOR_DOWN, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_OPTION | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT
